title: Japan’s Plan for Fukushima Wastewater Meets a Wall of Mistrust in Asia
content:
1. Japan’s Plan for Fukushima Wastewater Meets a Wall of Mistrust in Asia  The New York Times
  2. Japan To Dump Wastewater From Wrecked Fukushima Nuclear Plant Into Pacific Ocean  NPR
  3. Japan to Dump Treated Radioactive Fukushima Water Into Ocean  Bloomberg Markets and Finance
  4. US-Japan collusion on nuke wastewater disgusting: Global Times editorial  Global Times
  5. S. Korea, China protest Japan's plan to discharge Fukushima water; U.S. signals approval  Arirang News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 日本の福島廃水処理計画は、アジアでは不信の壁に直面している
日本的福岛污水处理计划在亚洲遭遇不信任之墙。
日本的福島污水處理計劃在亞洲遭遇不信任之牆。
